CustomField.description: Indicator whether territories need to be re-aligned for current account. Populated at trigger level when Territories__c field is changed and used further by external service to apply Territory Alignment Rules as a part of standard SF functionality.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicator whether territories need to be re-aligned for current account. Populated at trigger level when Territories__c field is changed and used further by external service to apply Territory Alignment Rules as a part of standard SF functionality.
CustomField.label: Need To Realign Territories
